resources.string: This is an application developed for a research project conducted by ALPS. Using this application, you will be recording your device usage and share the data with us anonymously. This is a valuable contribution for us and we thank you very much for your participation. \nTo start the application, please hit the \'Next\' button.

This is an application developed for a research project conducted by ALPS. Using this application, you will be recording your device usage and share the data with us anonymously. This is a valuable contribution for us and we thank you very much for your participation. \nTo start the application, please hit the \'Next\' button.
There will be a consent text here.
In this screen, you can see your \'Screen Usage\' for the last 7 days. The screen usage statistics start every day at midnight.
In this screen, you can see your \'Bluetooth\' usage for the last 7 days. The bluetooth usage statistics start every day at midnight.
In this screen, you can see your \'Wi-Fi\' usage for the last 7 days. The Wi-Fi usage statistics start every day at midnight.
